rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Knights! Loyal knights!
Knights!!! Beloved disciples!

rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, well, well... You've finally earned
the right to stand shoulder to shoulder
with me!

rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0003
rows.name:
I will now give special permission for
you to henceforth address me as
"Beloved Companion"!

rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0004
rows.name:
So don't hold back, just call me
Beloved Companion Narsus, whenever
you like! OK?! OK!!!

rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0005
rows.name:
Huh?! You just want to be normal
friends? Oh, well... OK...
I think we can agree on that.

rows.label: tlk70000122_10_msg0006
rows.name:
Friends... Ha! Friends! That has
a nice ring to it! I think I can get
used to this, friends!
